title: Click play again after match takes me to customs
body: Not sure if anybody else is having this problem but when ever I finish a match and click play again it takes me to the customs game list screen.

replies.body:
Presuming you're doing this from match-made games, you probably don't want this to be happening.

Try creating a support ticket and see what exactly is happening. Sorry that I cannot be much further help than that, but this is really out of my scope.

Best of luck.
Sorry I forgot to get back to you on this. I managed to fix it by doing a client repair. Cheers
